Reviews.Title: This will NOT work on At&T; LTE network (At&T; Bands 700/1700/2100)
Reviews.Author: nevvvw
Reviews.Content: This phone is great but sellers are misleading or not informing you that this phones WILL not work on US LTE networkscurrentlyAT and T uses frequency  700/1700 Bands 4/17 AWST-Mobile uses frequency  1700/1900 Band 4/25 AWSMetroPCS uses frequency 1700/1900 Bands 4/25 AWSEdit 05/28/2013T-Mobile started their At&T; compatible 3G service,my At&T; out of contract iPhone 4 works on 3G using a T-Mobile simearlier -till end of April-it worked only on EDGEso this phone should work on 3G on At&T; and T-Mobilestill it wont work on LTEso in a nutshell, if you are ok with 3G service? this phone is ok on both GSM networks in USA

Reviews.Title: I'm in love
Reviews.Author: Jessica Harmison
Reviews.Content: Shipping was great - very timely. Samsung packaging was perfect. The phone is PERFECT!Pros:• Jelly bean is great, super intuitive and responsive.• The S-pen is better than I anticipated. I'm writing this review with it.• The size is a pro for me! Movies look great and there is plenty of screen real estate for everything.• I love that accessory manufacturers are now recognizing that the iPhone isn't everything. There's a ton of stuff available for this thing.• The battery really is impressive. Full day of HEAVY usage doesn't phase it. Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, mobile data, movies, web browsing, games. Doesn't matter.Cons:• Everyone commenting on how big it is. Fits in my pocket, doesn't feel huge. Other phones feel tiny now.Other thoughts:• Might be a niche product, but I don't need two devices any more. I barely even use my computer now.• Best phone I've ever had!

Reviews.Title: A Great Phone with Inherent Flaws
Reviews.Author: Johnny Saigon®
Reviews.Content: Let's get to the nitty gritty:Pros:1- It's BIG. Big for gaming, big for videos, big for web browsing. Simply put, if you want a phone with the most real estate on the screen size, then there is no alternative. Don't be so mesmerized on the 1080p screens that will come out soon. Unless you want to destroy your eyes and use the phone from an inch away, you will not notice the difference in everyday use.2- It's fast. Yes, the Qualcomm S4 Pro quad-core beats this Tegra 3/Exynos 4 CPU in most benchmarks, but again, unless you are a hard-core geek that is OCD on numbers, you will not notice any difference in everyday use. There is no discernible lag anywhere (it's probably just your slow Internet connection).3- It's beautiful. Not HTC or Sony beautiful, but this is one sleek and stylish phone. The white is classic, but this Titanium Gray is awesome. Just check out the back cover and you will see what I mean (yes, even with that cheap-feeling plastic material).4- Did I mention the screen? It's BIG, it's bright, and it's beee-ay-eeww-ti-ful! AMOLED screens have awesome color saturation and contrast (most times even overkill, actually). Some people say it's not good in daylight. Um, have you tried cranking up the brightness??5- The Samsung/Android touch. Not everyone may like Samsung's Touchwiz user interface compiled onto Android, but I dare you to find a phone with more features than this one (and similarly the Galaxy S3). Here are the main highlights:a. Samsung utilizes the front facing camera almost to perfection. You can use it to control your music player; it has facial recognition to sense you are directly in front of the screen so it won't dim and turn off the screen (for reading, web browing, video playback, etc.); it recognizes your facial orientation so that when you are lying down sideways looking at the screen, the accelerometer will not kick in to auto-rotate the screen in the wrong orientation. That is something that has always bothered me with other phones and FINALLY someone has added that feature! Granted, not all these features work flawlessly, but it's a great start.b. Integration with Google is finally starting to show off in good ways. It was always once that Apple had the superior ecosystem. But now we see the future is bright indeed. Not just evolution, but finally innovation!c. The S Pen and all the neat things you can do with it. Preview a point in the movie before skipping to that point, and other things like going old-school back to the PDA days!6- It accepts up to a 64GB microSD card. That turned out to be the dealbreaker for me. Explanation in "cons" section below.Cons:1- It's BIG. With my tiny hands(hey hey), I can hardly do anything one-handed with this phone. Pocketability rating: -2. Putting it up on your face to make a phone call is also a big fail if you're sensitive to public ridicule like me. Have your Bluetooth earpiece ready.2- It's quite heavy. I really wanted to switch to the Verizon Droid DNA - for a 5-inch screen, it was remarkably svelte and light. And if it wasn't for the fact of pi$$-poor Verizon customer service at their call centers, and that it only had 16GB of memory with no microSD card option, I would have made the switch. The Droid DNA is superior in every way except those things mentioned. I have absolutely no doubt that the Samsung Note 3 (and maybe even the Galaxy S4) will be a 1080p screen with the Exynos 5 quadcore - can't wait!3- The screen may be bright and colorful, but it's way over-saturated and unnatural. Fortunately, you can go to the screen options and set it to "Natural." "Dynamic" is overkill, and even so is "Standard."Conclusion:Even with its inherent flaws, I can't help but love it. It's not even a phone, it's a cellular tablet(cablet, anyone??). I'm going to keep it. Until the next big thing is already here....

Reviews.Title: Great phone but limited to EDGE/2g service in the U.S.
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Oh man, I love this phone. It's absolutely everything I wanted and needed in a smartphone. However, it won't work on U.S. carriers. T-Mobile won't let it use anything other than 2g/EDGE service, Verizon couldn't activate it, and AT&T; wouldn't either. So if you're going to use it in the U.S., be prepared for only 2g wireless service. I am traveling abroad so this phone should work for me overseas.DO NOT EXPECT TO GET 4G SERVICE IN THE U.S. AS IT WON'T WORK. Seller really needed to make that abundantly clear in the description.

Reviews.Title: Best Phone Ever
Reviews.Author: Renz
Reviews.Content: This phone is superb. I can say perfect phone. Have long battery life, nice bright screen, and very fast processor.

Reviews.Title: Beautifully designed, great apps, good online support.
Reviews.Author: L. Lopez "perusa"
Reviews.Content: I did a LOT of research before making this purchase and I'm glad I did; I'm completely happy with my Galaxy Note II. I have the international model, N7105, which accepted the SIM from my old T-Mobile phone with no problems. I protected my investment with an excellent Otter case that, granted, adds some bulk but puts my mind at ease.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Omar Al-Oumi
Reviews.Content: I have updated this review, as 4G is working with me now. When I first purchased this phone, 4G didn't work. I tried everything I can do with no success. The 4G was enabled but no 4G signal. I searched the internet and found a way to access internal phone settings (special settings different from the normal settings) and found something called drx. I tried to change its setting and suddenly the phone restarted by itself, and when it caught the signal, wow ! 4G appeared ! I don't know what happened but it worked finally. But be aware that accessing these settings and playing with them may damage your phone if you are not aware of what you are doing.Going back to the phone itself, it is really a great phone that has everything I need; big screen, good resolution,  good battery, fast phone, fast connection - thanks to 4G.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Anthony Moore
Reviews.Content: This phone is exactly as advertised. Comes unlocked with 3G and 4G. Originally designed for the french market it comes with some french apps on it. The shipping was excellent and it arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: Be care, this is international unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: Xiaosen Liu
Reviews.Content: The phone is great.The warranty is executed by your wireless carrier, NOT Samsung america.Go to your carrier store (ATT verizon etc.) and register with them. Then the carrier will take care of its warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone at a Nice Price
Reviews.Author: Guillermo Salazar
Reviews.Content: Great Phone, at a very nice price, the phone looks very good, the package arrived very fast to the final destination, The only low was that the samsung charger was European electricity type and white colored so looked like did'nt belong to the phone, it included an adapter to plug it to regular american electricity. (Samsung Ear phones/handsfree were white too)

Reviews.Content: this device does not work in USA and no sport to this device in USA . so be sure before purchase this device

Reviews.Author: JorgeM
Reviews.Content: Great machine. Works perfect in Colombia. Great big screen. Is not friendly as an Iphone but truely a better phone

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lici
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is a nice phone. BUT THE SELLER is VERY deceiving. They SAY it is 4G... But only over there in the UK area.It will NOT work in the USA with our phone providers. You will get internet  access but the it. It will be VERY SLOW and VERY annoying to use.

Reviews.Title: HAPPY COSTUMER
Reviews.Author: DEH
Reviews.Content: GREAT PHONE! I had the iphone 5 for a week and i wasn't happy. For my luck the software broke before a week and apple gave my money back, so i was able to buy the android. I LOVE THE NOTE2.... So far 0 problems, works perfectly. Spen works fine.Unlocked, no problems when i put my sim card on.

Reviews.Title: Wish i could have another... :)
Reviews.Author: scott thomas
Reviews.Content: The phone is excellent. Since it is unlocked I can go to the Cell Phone company with the lowest prices and no contract. This is a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: A great phone.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. It is big enpugh to do some tablet things but it still fits in ny pocket. Functionally great. The Samsung add ons terrific.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note II N7105 Grey 4G/LTE Factory Unlocked International...
Reviews.Author: Mo
Reviews.Content: Great unlocked phone, only hickup is the fact that you only get edge and no 3/4g or lte in the US.

Reviews.Title: Watch out!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence A. Glickman
Reviews.Content: This phone is not compatible with USA carriers or in Colombia where I'm living for now. I had to return it and purchase a t889 model (Tmobile unlocked) to suit my needs, Look up your frequencies before buying.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: abdul10211
Reviews.Content: Nice phone. No complaints so far. Taking some getting use to considering I traded in my Iphone. Note is a nice piece of hardware.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note II
Reviews.Author: GREGORY A BOLDUC
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, she now has 2 other phones besides this one as well as a Kindle Fire. She likes the Galaxy Note the best. It allows her to connect with all her friends as well as take pictures and shop on the internet. She seems to stay connected much better with this product.

Reviews.Title: I recommend 100%
Reviews.Author: Fabian
Reviews.Content: This item is really nice, super fast for all, downloading from internet or somethings function. Excelent purchase I recommend. I 'm very satisfied with my phone.  I live in Costa Rica and movistar carrier didn't have nothing problem.

Reviews.Title: cell phone canot connect to towers, internet cannot be use
Reviews.Author: elymar torres
Reviews.Content: The phone cannot conect to the internet towers. Would only works when wifi was available. Very inconvenience if you are going to use the web

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Agustín
Reviews.Content: excellent product, fit this classification because it seems a good product and I definitely recommend it to other people .....

Reviews.Title: galaxy note 2 international version
Reviews.Author: frederik y.
Reviews.Content: I have problem with my note 2 that i ordered a month ago but until now there is no solution with that

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 11 N7105 Grey 4G/LTE Factory Unlocked International Version
Reviews.Author: Crisari
Reviews.Content: A really nice product. Not too large, phone works like any Samsung Galaxy with internet capability and connectivity. A source of entertainment, research and conveniently provided with a stylus for note making.

Reviews.Title: gr8 product
Reviews.Author: curlian
Reviews.Content: I loveeeeeeeeeeee note 2, i can finally get all the games i wanted to play and apps i wanted to test. HD games and perfect picture quality however after installing the 4.3 upgrade to the os it has a few bugs, for example my s voice now doesn't really understand everything im saying, the smart stay doesnt work at all and the transfer to sd card for the apps just messed up the apps, in order for you to play a game again you have to clear your cache. i don't want to root my phone but it seems i will eventually have to in order to get my old os back or get some 3rd party apps to have my apps install straight to my sd card. I had to put the voice command off after update cause now my music would just randomly stop.If you are looking for an awesome phablet then the note 2 is the one for you, just don't get the 4.3 android update in a hurry.

Reviews.Title: This Phone is a Keeper
Reviews.Author: Audio Visual Integrator "LDCrewe"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because of its tablet capabilities as well as the fact that the Samsung Galaxy series in my opinion is equal to or out performs the iPhone. There is nothing the iPhone can do that my new Galaxy Note 2 can't.You got to try the tablet capabilities for yourself because it alone will give you more features than you can ever use.A hint is to go online and look at some of he featured videos for this phone prior to purchasing it.I am a launcher critic for most cell phones but Samsung provided launcher is pretty good; in fact you won't get much more by changing to a new launcher.I thought this thing would be just too big because I carry my phone in my pants pocket, but I tried my daughter's Note 2 and it fit very well into the pocket. When I purchased mind I immediately put on Speck protective case and it slid in and out of my pocket with no problems at all.I've got to say that it looks huge for a cell phone but it works great functionally and physically.Checkout the positive reviews for this phone the negative reviews are people that will find a problem with anything and nothing is perfect for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Best mobile I've ever had
Reviews.Author: reivajtux
Reviews.Content: I don't know what else to say that other web reviews haven't already said. The phone is amazing, very fast, battery consumption is wonderful (Just using it as a phone battery runs out after a day! and using the 3G + 2 hrs of music + 1 hr video + phone calls + doing some math calculus… the battery runs out after 14 hrs). The best thing is the screen and it's wide enough to write pdf notes, drawing and write some LaTex docs.It's fully unlocked I have used it in south america, Australia and Asia, with 3G.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: kittykat
Reviews.Content: this was a great phone, worked with simple mobile but I traded it for the note 3, wanted more speed and better camera, overall, if you not looking for those items, this phone is just as great as the note 3

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: DEREJE AYALEW
Reviews.Content: It is z most user friendly and full option handy.I also didn't expect it like this,but it is more than my expectation.

Reviews.Title: no 4G in the USA
Reviews.Author: Gruyo
Reviews.Content: the 4G feature doesn't work in the US. I've have travel to a lot of cities in the US and cannot get 4G with this phone

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic deviceYou'll have a computer in your handsDon't hesitate, and buy it, you won't regret it, this thing is a real thing

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: It met my expectations. Works great. Downloads very fast. No problems thus far. I would encourage  anyone to buy it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: L. Paul C. "chemist"
Reviews.Content: Excellent features,,,The right size for my hands. And a  more then adequate replacement for both my old phone and laptop

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: saud alali
Reviews.Content: i bought this virsion as it LTE for my country .. like his brother note 2 same .. but  add LTE im from kuwait

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note 2
Reviews.Author: Jaliyl
Reviews.Content: There's nothing bad for me to say about this phone. I really wanted to have a large touch screen phone that works really well. This phone is amazing!!! I had no problems with it so far and I love the stylus pen. Personally for me I'll never get used to going back to a smaller screen phone and this phone is really not at all big enough where it is bulky or just a nuisance to carry around. I think that the screen size at 5.5 inches is just perfect. I would highly recommend this phone for everybody!

Reviews.Title: big thing from big manufacturer
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: this is a product that the quality can not be surpassbut unfortunately I did not get this product rather the seller supply me with another model,I actually place order for (Samsung Galaxy Note II N7105 Grey 4G/LTE Factory Unlocked International Version LTE/4G BANDS 800 / 900 / 1800 / 2600 by Samsung) according to the way the seller describe it  but at the end of the day I get (Samsung SGH-I317M Galaxy Note II 16GB) but I still belief the manipulation was from the seller so I still rate this product high

Reviews.Title: Vendor's unclear advertising
Reviews.Author: TRB
Reviews.Content: I wiLL nevvvver do another cell phone purchase with Amazon.com due to the fact that I got charged nearly $100.00 in a "restocking fee" in addition to paying the postage to send it back because the vender FAILED to be clear that this phone would noTTT be compatible with Verizon or Sprint networks !!! So any moneys that I might have saved a little on by shopping with Amazon.com have essentially been negated thereby making me HIGHLY reluctant to evvvver shop with them again in the future !!!  $100.00 for "restocking" is pure unadulterated thievery !!!

Reviews.Title: about resend option
Reviews.Author: amritpal s dhillon
Reviews.Content: This phone is good but when I text there is no option for resend text u have to go by forward thats only I don't like so far phone is realy goooooood

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: L.D.
Reviews.Content: Hi, I'm into new tech & stuff, so I bought this note 2 and just love it.At this moment there is no competitors for this product in all market.Speed, screen, performance and comfort, these are the things this note nails.Just luv it and wont change it to nothing.

Reviews.Title: great

Reviews.Content: amazing product in amazing package.just received it yesterdaytook time to reach zambia.was scared that something not nice happen in the way.thanx
